Kolaghan Stormsinger

Creature - Human Shaman
C

Haste

Megamorph R (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for 3. You may turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

When Kolaghan Stormsinger is turned face up, target creature gains haste until end of turn.
